Camera as a Microscope: By using a macro lens, a camera can be used as a microscope to capture high-resolution images of small objects or surfaces.
Camera as a Time-Lapse Machine: By setting the camera to take photos at regular intervals, it can be used to create a time-lapse video of a scene.
Camera as a Security System: By using a camera to monitor a space, it can be used as a security system to detect any suspicious activity.
Camera as a Night Vision Device: By using a special type of lens, a camera can be used as a night vision device to see in low light conditions.
Camera as a Thermal Imaging Device: By using a special type of lens, a camera can be used as a thermal imaging device to see temperature changes in objects or surfaces.
